mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barter Theatre's 52nd Season, 1984 plays and calender, historic Abingdon Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Pamphlet for Barter Theatre 52nd Season with production information for plays: Tintypes by Mary Kyte with Mel Marvin and Gary Pearle| Crimes of the Heart by Beth Henley| The Good Doctor by Neil Simon| Artichoke by Joanna M. Glass| Mass Appeal by Bill C. Davis| Promenade, All! by David V. Robison| Bell, Book and Candle by John Van Druten. Pamphlet includes a calender for the plays performed on April thru Oct. 1984. It also includes information about history of Abingdon, Va and The Barter Theatre.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Abingdon, Washington county, Virginia, United States
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
